DOC.brief_summary: Based multi-center clinical research resource , large-scale prospective cohort study conduted make accurate diagnosis intervention plan Non-immune fetal hydrops ( NIFH ) , establish NIFH accurate treatment strategy suitable China 's national condition .
DOC.brief_title: Precision Medical Research Non-immune Fetal Hydrops ( NIFH ) -From Prenatal Diagnosis Intrauterine Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Etiological study Non-immune fetal hydrops ( NIFH ) : 1 . Etiological study NIFH mid-pregnancy period ; 2 . Etiological study NIFH hygroma colli first trimester ; 3 . Value assessment technology exome sequence diagnosis NIFH ; 2 . The accuracy NIFH intrauterine intervention effect assessment : 1 . Perinatal outcomes NIFH ; 2 . The effect intrauterine treatment .
DOC.criteria: Cases correspond diagnosis standard Willing accept regular followup Immune hydrops fetalis Multiple pregnancy , except twintotwin transfusion syndrome IV
